name: online jobs for moms
short_description:
Many of IBM's divisions offer telecommuting opportunities for those interested in online careers. Among some of those positions, a work at home mom could telecommute in sales or marketing. IBM does not specifically identify telecommuting opportunities, in its career database. You'll need to get management's approval before you'll be able to telecommute.
Millions of hours are wasted yearly in commercial cities, by commuters travelling to and from work, as traffic stretched for miles along road ways, especially during peak or rush hours. It is said that the average commuting time range between 30-45 minutes to work with approximately the same time from work. All this time when calculated come to a lot of unproductive hours. Working at home drastically cuts the cost of commuting to and from work.If you practice good time management then working at home can afford you the opportunity to create the right balance of providing for the material needs of your family as well as satisfying their
